item.title: Yell Command
item.dc:creator: @mrpopyman mrpopyman
item.description:
@mrpopyman wrote:

this code works for me:

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) { String text = command.substring(5); if((donator==1) && (playerRights<=0)){ yell("@gre@[@gre@Donator] "+ playerName + ":@gre@ " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } else if(playerRights==1){ yell("@blu@[@blu@Mod] "+ playerName + ":@red@ " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } else if(playerRights==2){ yell("@cya@[@cya@Admin] "+ playerName + ":@red@ " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } else if(playerRights==3){ yell("@red@[@red@Owner] "+ playerName + ":@mag@ " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } else if(playerRights==4){ yell("@red@[@blu@Owner] "+ playerName + ":@mag@ " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Yell Command
item.dc:creator: @h4ckingYOURLife h4ckingYOURLife
item.description:
@h4ckingYOURLife wrote:

deathschaos9:

Both of you realize your commands use the yell method, which he doesn’t have, right?

oh lawl dident see that

yell method

[code] public void yell(String message) {
for (Player p : handler.players) {
if ((message.indexOf(“tradereq”) > 0)
|| (message.indexOf(“duelreq”) > 0))
return;
if ((p == null) || !p.isActive)
continue;
client temp = (client) p;
if ((temp.absX > 0) && (temp.absY > 0))
if ((temp != null) && !temp.disconnected && p.isActive)
temp.sM(message);
}
}

}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Yell Command
item.dc:creator: @h4ckingYOURLife h4ckingYOURLife
item.description:
@h4ckingYOURLife wrote:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“yell”)) {
String titles = “”;

if (playerRights == 0) {
titles = "[PLAYER]- ";
}
if (donator == 1) {
titles = "[>$DONATOR$<]- ";
}
if (playerRights == 1) {
titles = "[Mod]- ";
}
if (playerRights == 2) {
titles = "[Admin]- ";
}
if (playerRights == 3) {
titles = "[Staff]- ";
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“YourInputhere”)) {
titles = “[>[OWNER]<]-”;
}
yell(titles + “” + playerName + ": "

  • command.substring(5));
    }[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Yell Command
item.dc:creator: @pea2nuts pea2nuts
item.description:
@pea2nuts wrote:

try my old servers yell

[code=java]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 3) {
String titles = “”;

            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@whi@[Moderator]-";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Admin]-";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@yel@[Owner]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "@blu@[Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@whi@[Mod/Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Admin/Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@red@[FUCKIN OWNER]-@whi@ ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@blu@[Super Donator]-@gre@ ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@whi@[Mod/Super Donator]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Admin/Super Donator]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@blu@[Owner/Super Donator]-@gre@ ";
            }
            yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                    + command.substring(5));

}[/code]

Read full topic
